solution_line_template: Each screen shows movies all day, which means each screen shows {open_hours} hours/day / {movie_duration} hours per movie = <<{open_hours}/{movie_duration}={movies_per_screen_per_day}>>{movies_per_screen_per_day} movies/day.
So in total, the movie theater shows {num_screens} screens * {movies_per_screen_per_day} movies/day = <<{num_screens}*{movies_per_screen_per_day}={total_movies}>>{total_movies} movies.
